name: llm-security-firewall
summary: Cognitive Security Middleware - The 'Electronic Stability Program' (ESP) for Large Language Models. Bidirectional containment system with defense-in-depth architecture (6 validation layers), stateful tracking, and mathematical safety constraints. Validated against Unicode/encoding attacks, pattern evasion, multilingual/polyglot attacks (12+ languages including Basque, Maltese), and memory/session attacks. Protocol-based hexagonal architecture with LangChain integration.
